posts.post_content:
(SOLD) This card has amazing color and registration. It’s only a 1.5 because of minor paper loss on the back that doesn’t even affect the checklist. Its as nice a low grade t3 as you will find. Usually 1.5’s are either rough or have pinholes. $4,300 delivered. (SOLD)
[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/t3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/t3b.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="orly57" post=1803118]This card has amazing color and registration. It’s only a 1.5 because of minor paper loss on the back that doesn’t even affect the checklist. Its as nice a low grade t3 as you will find. 5k delivered. I can only post little images anymore (in duplicate to boot!). If you are interested, pm me your number and I’ll text you front and back pics.[/QUOTE]

Orly- Do you have an asking price in mind? Also, if you send me large scans, front and or back, I can host them on my personal website and make them much larger here...just send to my email if you want to...
LL
Thanks Leon. I’ll send you pics in a moment. I posted the price at 5k delivered overnight.

[quote name="orly57" post=1803145]Thanks Leon. I’ll send you pics in a moment. I posted the price at 5k delivered overnight.[/QUOTE]

Here ya go...a bit larger. Great looking card. Good luck

I was told by some members whose opinions I respect that I was a tad high on this card. I’ve adjusted to the correct value on a high end 1.5. 
$4,300 delivered.
